org.apache.poi.hslf.record

Class StyleTextPropAtom

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.hslf.record.Record
      • org.apache.poi.hslf.record.RecordAtom
        • org.apache.poi.hslf.record.StyleTextPropAtom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericRecord 

    public final class StyleTextPropAtom
extends RecordAtom
    A StyleTextPropAtom (type 4001). Holds basic character properties (bold, italic, underline, font size etc) and paragraph properties (alignment, line spacing etc) for the block of text (TextBytesAtom or TextCharsAtom) that this record follows. You will find two lists within this class. 1 - Paragraph style list (paragraphStyles) 2 - Character style list (charStyles) Both are lists of TextPropCollections. These define how many characters the style applies to, and what style elements make up the style (another list, this time of TextProps). Each TextProp has a value, which somehow encapsulates a property of the style(StyleTextPropAtom（类型4001）。保存此记录后面的文本块（TextBytesAtom或TextCharsAtom）的基本字符属性（粗体、Italian、underline、字体大小等）和段落属性（对齐方式、行间距等）。您会在此类中找到两个列表。1 -段落样式列表（paragraphStyles）2 -字符样式列表（charStyles）两者都是文本PropCollections的列表。这些定义了样式适用于多少个字符，以及构成样式的样式元素（另一个列表，这次是文本Props）。每个文本Prop都有一个值，该值以某种方式封装了样式的属性)

      • getParagraphTextLengthCovered

        public int getParagraphTextLengthCovered()
        Returns how many characters the paragraph's TextPropCollections cover. (May be one or two more than the underlying text does, due to having extra characters meaning something special to powerpoint)(返回段落的文本PropCollections涵盖的字符数。(May比基础文本多一两个，因为有额外的字符对于PowerPoint来说意味着特殊的东西）)
